welcome_message.text: Welcome {user} for joining this game, your account has been successfully created, please have fun!
welcome_message.text_TG: Welcome {user} for joining this game, your account has been successfully created, please have fun!

no_account.text:
{user} 您还没有创建账号，请使用`开始`（`^ks`、`^start`、`^begin`）指令创建账号！（推荐：在Bot私聊/DM使用此指令，以最大化保护您的隐私。）
{user} You have not created an account yet, Please use `^start` or `^begin` to create one. (Recommendation: Use this command in Bot DM for maximum privacy protection.)
no_account.text_TG:
❌ **No Account Found**

{user} You have not created an account yet, please use `/register` to create one!
您还没有创建账号，请使用 `/register` 指令创建账号！

cultivation_start.text:
{user}, You have started your 2 hour long cultivation, which ends {end_time}
You will receive **{culti_gain}** cultivation afterwards.

cultivation_end.text:
Your cultivation just ended! You have received **{culti_gain}** cultivation.
Use `^stat` to check your new status.
-# If the received cultivation in this message does not match with the one stated in starting message, this high chance indicates that tere is an error. Report it to Bot Admin ASAP.

already_account.text:
{user}, You have already created an account, please use other commands.
-# If `^stat` or `/acc` "says you have not created an account yet", it might be database error, report it to Bot Admin(s) immediately!
already_account.text_TG:
✅ **Account Already Exists**

{user} You already have an account, please use other commands.
您已创建过账号，请使用其他指令。

Use `/stat` to check status | 使用 `/stat` 查看状态

train_in_progress.text: {user}, You are currently cultivating, unable to use this command.

waiting_time.text: {user}, You have aready hunted within the last 60min, please wait patiently!

intro_text.text:
## Thank you for using this Bot!
Description.

### Title 3
「Introduction_EN」

xx_commands.text:
## Bot Command List (Prefix: `^`):
### DM Commands:
- `^start` —— Create account
    Alias: `^begin` | `^ks`
- `^/acc` —— View account details, or change your in-game name and language, or redeem codes.
### Game Commands:
- `^intro` —— Get introduction of this Bot.
    Alias: `^js`
- `^cul` —— Cultivate for 2hr, some commands will be locked.
    Alias: `^sit` | `^xl`
- `^hunt` —— Go for a hunting, to get copper, cultivation, and low chance for gold.
    Alias: `wild` | `^dy`
- `^asc` —— Increase your stage level when your cultivation has reached current stage\'s maximum.
    Alias: `^ascend` | `^tp`
- `^stat` —— View your current status.
    Alias: `^zt`
- `^inv` —— View your inventory.
    Alias: `^wp`
- `^test` —— View test details.
    Alias: `^beta` | `^cs`
- `^shop` —— Purchase items.
    Alias: `^sd`
- `^ele` —— Check or choose elements.
    Alias: `^element` | `^ys`
- `^exp` —— Missing textmap
    Alias: `^ts`
- `^challenge` —— Missing textmap
    Alias: `^tz`
### Other Commands
- `/help` —— Shows this message.
    Alias: `^help` | `^h` | `^bz`
- `/luck` —— Missing textmap
- `/lunar` —— Missing textmap
Current Ver: `{xx_version} (Internal)`

account_creation_prompt.text:
提交表单以完成账号注册，请点击下方按钮。
Submit the form to complete account creation by clicking the button below.

ascend_success.text: Congratulations, {user_ingame_name}, You ascended successfully! Now your are in {new_stage_description}.

ascend_fail.text: Sadly, {user_ingame_name} **failed to ascend**. Cultivation reduced to 50%.

lightning_progress.text: The lightning no. {lightningNum} has fallen, and {user_ingame_name} **{condition}**.

insufficient_exp.text: Your cultivation has not reached the stage maximum, unable to ascend.

sign_success.text: {user_ingame_name}, You have successfully signed in, received **Gold\*1** and **Copper\*500**.

already_sign.text: {user_ingame_name}, You have already signed in today! Use this command again tomorrow 04:00 (Server Time).

hunt_cooldown.text: {user}, Your hunting is still in cool down, which ends {remaining_time}.

account_setting.description: Embed details of user's account settings

privacy.description: response for dm commands used in public
privacy.text: For your privacy, please use this command in DM with the bot!

redeem_code_expired.text: Code expired or have not started redeeming

shop_view_description.text: Welcome to the shop. Use `^shop buy <ID>` to purchase.

shop_no_items.text: No items found in the shop.

shop_invalid_subcommand.text: Invalid subcommand. Use `^shop` or `^shop view` to list items, `^shop buy <ID>` to purchase.

shop_item_not_found.text: No shop item found with ID `{shop_item_id}`.

shop_buy_insufficient_funds.text: You do not have enough {currency} to buy {item_name}.

ele_check.text:
Today's Element: `{daily_element}`.

Other Related Commands:
- `^ele choose`——Check available elements for choosing.
- `^ele choose <num>`——Choose your desired element.
- `^ele rule`——To view rules of the element buffing system.

ele_stage_too_low.text: Your stage has not reached {required_stage}, unable to choose an element now!

ele_cd_active.text: You have already chosen an element in the past 30 days, please wait {remaining_time} before changing again!

ele_invalid_choice.text: Invalid selection, please enter the correct number or element name!

ele_choose_success.text: Selection success, your current element is `{chosen}`.

ele_cannot_choose.text: You are currently cultivating, unable to complete this action.

ele_rules.text:
【Element Buff Rules】

1. **Matching Element** (When your chosen element matches today’s element):
   - Cultivation Gain: **1.5x**
   - Hunt Command – Copper Gain: **2.0x**
   - Hunt Command – Gold Chance: **2.0x**
   - Ascension Failure Rate: **8%**

2. **Restrained Element** (When today’s element restrains your chosen element: Dendro→Geo, Geo→Hydro, Hydro→Pyro, Pyro→Metallo, Metallo→Dendro):
   - Cultivation Gain: **0.75x**
   - Hunt Command – Copper Gain: **0.75x**
   - Hunt Command – Gold Chance: No change
   - Ascension Failure Rate: **15%**

3. **Mutual Element** (When today’s element is mutually beneficial with your chosen element: Dendro→Pyro, Pyro→Geo, Geo→Metallo, Metallo→Hydro, Hydro→Dendro):
   - Cultivation Gain: **2.0x**
   - Hunt Command – Copper Gain: **1.5x**
   - Hunt Command – Gold Chance: No change
   - Ascension Failure Rate: **10%**

4. **Other Cases**: No changes are applied.

*Note: Multipliers are applied to base values and any fractional results are rounded down.*
*Special thanks to ChatGPT for analysing of code and textmap generating.*

account_link_request.text:
🔗 **Account Link Request**

Generating verification code...
OTP will be sent to your preferred platform.

正在为您生成验证码...
验证码将发送到您的首选平台。
account_link_request.text_TG:
🔗 **Account Link Request**

Generating verification code...
OTP will be sent to your preferred platform.

Use `/verify <OTP>` to complete linking
使用 `/verify <验证码>` 完成关联

account_link_success.text:
✅ **Account Linked Successfully**

Your {platform} account has been successfully linked to the game account!
您的 {platform} 账号已成功关联到游戏账号！
account_link_success.text_TG:
✅ **Account Linked Successfully**

Your Telegram account has been successfully linked to the game account!
您的 Telegram 账号已成功关联到游戏账号！

account_link_failed.text:
❌ **Account Linking Failed**

An error occurred during linking, please try again later.
关联过程中出现错误，请稍后重试。
account_link_failed.text_TG:
❌ **Account Linking Failed**

An error occurred during linking, please try again later.
关联过程中出现错误，请稍后重试。

otp_sent.text:
📨 **OTP Sent**

OTP has been sent to your {platform} account.
Please use the verification code within 5 minutes to complete linking.

验证码已发送到您的 {platform} 账号。
请在 5 分钟内使用验证码完成关联。

📨 **OTP Sent**

OTP has been sent to your account.
Please use `/verify <OTP>` within 5 minutes to complete linking.

验证码已发送到您的账号。
请使用 `/verify <验证码>` 在 5 分钟内完成关联。

OTP is invalid or expired, please request a new one.
